TestCase.name: testFullOuterJoinWithEquiAndLocalPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable2 FULL OUTER JOIN MyTable1 ON a = d AND d < 2

LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2))], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (d < 2))], select=[d, g, a, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, g]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a, c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testFullOuterJoinWithEquiAndNonEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable2 FULL OUTER JOIN MyTable1 ON a = d AND d < 2 AND b < h

LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1], f=[$2], g=[$3], h=[$4], a=[$5], b=[$6], c=[$7]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2), <($6, $4))], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

SortMergeJoin(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (d < 2) AND (b < h))], select=[d, e, f, g, h, a, b, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testFullOuterJoinWithEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable1 FULL OUTER JOIN MyTable2 ON b = e

LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[(b = e)], select=[b, c, e, g]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) : +- Calc(select=[b, c]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) +- Calc(select=[e, g]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testFullOuterWithUsing
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM MyTable1) FULL JOIN (SELECT * FROM MyTable3) USING (a)

LogicalProject(a=[COALESCE($0, $3)], b=[$1], c=[$2], b0=[$4], c0=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[full]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[COALESCE(a, a0) AS a, b, c, b0, c0]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[FullOuterJoin], where=[(a = a0)], select=[a, b, c, a0, b0, c0]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithEquiAndLocalPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable2 INNER JOIN MyTable1 ON a = d AND d < 2

LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a = d)], select=[d, g, a, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, g], where=[(d < 2)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a, c], where=[(a < 2)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoinWithEquiAndNonEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable2 LEFT OUTER JOIN MyTable1 ON a = d AND d < 2 AND b < h

LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1], f=[$2], g=[$3], h=[$4], a=[$5], b=[$6], c=[$7]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2), <($6, $4))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

SortMergeJoin(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (d < 2) AND (b < h))], select=[d, e, f, g, h, a, b, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithEquiAndNonEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable2 INNER JOIN MyTable1 ON a = d AND d < 2 AND b < h

LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1], f=[$2], g=[$3], h=[$4], a=[$5], b=[$6], c=[$7]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2), <($6, $4))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (b < h))], select=[d, e, f, g, h, a, b, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, e, f, g, h], where=[(d < 2)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[(a < 2)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE a = d

LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a = d)], select=[a, c, d, g]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, c]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- Calc(select=[d, g]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable2, MyTable1 WHERE a = d AND d < 2

LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a = d)], select=[d, g, a, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, g], where=[(d < 2)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a, c], where=[(a < 2)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFilterPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (select a, count(b) as b from MyTable1 group by a) join (select d, count(e) as e from MyTable2 group by d) on true where a = d and b = e and d = 2

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], d=[$2], e=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), =($1, $3), =($2, 2))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b=[COUNT($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], e=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[a, b, CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS d, e]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (b = e))], select=[a, b, d, e]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) : +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS b]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_COUNT(b) AS count$0]) : +- Calc(select=[CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS a, b], where=[(a = 2)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d, e]]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[d], select=[d, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS e]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, Partial_COUNT(e) AS count$0]) +- Calc(select=[CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS d, e], where=[(d = 2)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithInvertedField
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE b = e AND a = d

LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($1, $4), =($0, $3))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[((b = e) AND (a = d))], select=[a, b, c, d, e, g]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b, a]]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e, d]]) +- Calc(select=[d, e, g]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithMultipleKeys
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable2 INNER JOIN MyTable1 ON a = d AND b = e

LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), =($6, $1))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (b = e))], select=[d, e, g, a, b, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d, e]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, e, g]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithNonEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, d FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE a + 1 = d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(+($0, 1), $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[a, d]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[($f3 = d)], select=[a, $f3, d]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f3]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, (a + 1) AS $f3]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- Calc(select=[d]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testJoinPartitionTableWithNonExistentPartition
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM leftPartitionTable, rightPartitionTable WHERE b1 = 1 AND b2 = 3 AND a1 = a2

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b1=[$1], a2=[$2], b2=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($1, 1), =($3, 3), =($0, $2))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, leftPartitionTable]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, rightPartitionTable]])
Values(tuples=[[]], values=[a1, b1, a2, b2])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithFilterPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (select a, count(b) as b from MyTable1 group by a) left join (select d, count(e) as e from MyTable2 group by d) on true where a = d and b = e and a = 2

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], d=[$2], e=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), =($1, $3), =($0, 2))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b=[COUNT($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], e=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS a, b, d, CAST(e AS BIGINT) AS e]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (b = e))], select=[a, b, d, e]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) : +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS b]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_COUNT(b) AS count$0]) : +- Calc(select=[CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS a, b], where=[(a = 2)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d, e]]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[d], select=[d, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS e]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, Partial_COUNT(e) AS count$0]) +- Calc(select=[CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS d, e], where=[(d = 2)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithJoinConditionPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (select a, count(b) as b from MyTable1 group by a) left join (select d, count(e) as e from MyTable2 group by d) on a = d and b = e and a = 2 and e = 1

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], d=[$2], e=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), =($1, $3), =($0, 2), =($3, 1))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b=[COUNT($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], e=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

MultipleInput(members=[
SortMergeJoin(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (b = 1) AND (a = 2))], select=[a, b, d, e])
:- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS b])
: +- [#1] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]])
+- Calc(select=[d, e], where=[(e = 1)])
 +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[d], select=[d, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS e])
 +- [#2] Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]])
]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_COUNT(b) AS count$0]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, Partial_COUNT(e) AS count$0]) +- Calc(select=[d, e]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoinWithEquiAndLocalPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable2 LEFT OUTER JOIN MyTable1 ON a = d AND d < 2

LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (d < 2))], select=[d, g, a, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, g]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a, c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRightOuterJoinWithEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable1 RIGHT OUTER JOIN MyTable2 ON b = e

LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[(b = e)], select=[b, c, e, g]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) : +- Calc(select=[b, c]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) +- Calc(select=[e, g]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithJoinConditionPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (select a, count(b) as b from MyTable1 group by a) join (select d, count(e) as e from MyTable2 group by d) on a = d and b = e and d = 2 and b = 1

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], d=[$2], e=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), =($1, $3), =($2, 2), =($1, 1))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b=[COUNT($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], e=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[a, 1 AS b, CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS d, 1 AS e]) +- MultipleInput(members=[
SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a = d)], select=[a, d])
:- Calc(select=[a], where=[(b = 1)])
: +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS b])
: +- [#1] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]])
+- Calc(select=[d], where=[(e = 1)])
 +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[d], select=[d, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS e])
 +- [#2] Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]])
]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_COUNT(b) AS count$0]) : +- Calc(select=[CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS a, b], where=[(a = 2)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, Partial_COUNT(e) AS count$0]) +- Calc(select=[CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS d, e], where=[(d = 2)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoinWithFilter2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT d, e, f FROM MyTable1 LEFT JOIN MyTable2 ON a = d where d IS NULL AND a < 12

LogicalProject(d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(IS NULL($3), <($0, 12))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[null:INTEGER AS d, e, f], where=[d IS NULL]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[(a = d)], select=[a, d, e, f]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a], where=[(a < 12)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- Calc(select=[d, e, f], where=[(d < 12)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoinWithFilter3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT d, e, f FROM MyTable1 LEFT JOIN MyTable2 ON a = d where d < 10 AND a < 12

LogicalProject(d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(<($3, 10), <($0, 12))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[d, e, f]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a = d)], select=[a, d, e, f]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a], where=[(a < 10)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- Calc(select=[d, e, f], where=[(d < 10)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoinWithFilter4
TestCase.Resource: SELECT d, e, f FROM MyTable1 LEFT JOIN MyTable2 ON a = d where d = null

LogicalProject(d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($3, null)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])
Values(tuples=[[]], values=[d, e, f])

TestCase.name: testRightJoinWithFilterPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (select a, count(b) as b from MyTable1 group by a) right join (select d, count(e) as e from MyTable2 group by d) on true where a = d and b = e and d = 2

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], d=[$2], e=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), =($1, $3), =($2, 2))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b=[COUNT($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], e=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[a, CAST(b AS BIGINT) AS b, CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS d, e]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (b = e))], select=[a, b, d, e]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) : +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS b]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_COUNT(b) AS count$0]) : +- Calc(select=[CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS a, b], where=[(a = 2)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d, e]]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[d], select=[d, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS e]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, Partial_COUNT(e) AS count$0]) +- Calc(select=[CAST(2 AS INTEGER) AS d, e], where=[(d = 2)]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testRightJoinWithJoinConditionPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (select a, count(b) as b from MyTable1 group by a) right join (select d, count(e) as e from MyTable2 group by d) on a = d and b = e and d = 2 and b = 1

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], d=[$2], e=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), =($1, $3), =($2, 2), =($1, 1))], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b=[COUNT($1)]) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], e=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

MultipleInput(members=[
SortMergeJoin(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (1 = e) AND (d = 2))], select=[a, b, d, e])
:- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[(b = 1)])
: +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS b])
: +- [#2] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]])
+- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[d], select=[d, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS e])
 +- [#1] Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]])
]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[d], select=[d, Partial_COUNT(e) AS count$0]) : +- Calc(select=[d, e]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_COUNT(b) AS count$0]) +- Calc(select=[a, b]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoinWithEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MyTable2 ON b = e

LogicalProject(c=[$2], g=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[(b = e)], select=[b, c, e, g]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) : +- Calc(select=[b, c]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) +- Calc(select=[e, g]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h])

TestCase.name: testRightOuterJoinWithEquiAndNonEquiPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable2 RIGHT OUTER JOIN MyTable1 ON a = d AND d < 2 AND b < h

LogicalProject(d=[$0], e=[$1], f=[$2], g=[$3], h=[$4], a=[$5], b=[$6], c=[$7]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2), <($6, $4))], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

SortMergeJoin(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[((a = d) AND (b < h))], select=[d, e, f, g, h, a, b, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, e, f, g, h], where=[(d < 2)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testRightOuterJoinWithEquiAndLocalPred
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c, g FROM MyTable2 RIGHT OUTER JOIN MyTable1 ON a = d AND d < 2

LogicalProject(c=[$7], g=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($5, $0), <($0, 2))], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[c, g]) +- SortMergeJoin(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[(a = d)], select=[d, g, a, c]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[d]]) : +- Calc(select=[d, g], where=[(d < 2)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]], fields=[d, e, f, g, h]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a, c]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testSelfJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM src WHERE k = 0) src1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * from src WHERE k = 0) src2 ON (src1.k = src2.k AND src2.k > 10)

LogicalProject(k=[$0], v=[$1], k0=[$2], v0=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), >($2, 10))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(k=[$0], v=[$1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, source: [TestTableSource(k, v)]]]) +- LogicalProject(k=[$0], v=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, source: [TestTableSource(k, v)]]])

SortMergeJoin(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[(k = k0)], select=[k, v, k0, v0]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[k]]) : +- Calc(select=[CAST(0 AS BIGINT) AS k, v], where=[(k = 0)]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, source: [TestTableSource(k, v)]]], fields=[k, v]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[k]]) +- Values(tuples=[[]], values=[k, v])
